thread.title: CashStar President and CEO to Speak at Intersect Retail
thread.title_full: CashStar President and CEO to Speak at Intersect Retail

author: admin
title: CashStar President and CEO to Speak at Intersect Retail
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 6:01 AM Companies mentioned in this article: CashStar 
PORTLAND, Maine -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- CashStar , the industry-leading provider of prepaid commerce solutions, today announced that its president and CEO, Ben Kaplan, will speak on a panel at Intersect Retail Apparel & Accessories in New York on October 22. Kaplan will join other industry thought leaders on the panel titled, “Looking Into the Crystal Ball: What is the Future of eCommerce Technology?,” to discuss how deploying new technologies for customers can play an important role in the way companies define their brand within the customer’s mind. Kaplan will address how prepaid commerce and digital gifting capabilities are some of the vital technologies driving retailers’ omni-channel success. 
Intersect Retail, which is in its fourth year, brings together ecommerce executives to discuss hot button topics affecting the apparel and accessories space. This year’s theme, “Creating a Seamless Customer Journey,” ties together discussions regarding relationship management, data acquisition, omni-channel strategies and social engagement. Who:
